shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the camera focus area changes.
Occurs when the camera focus area changes.

section.p: 该回调表示相机的对焦区域发生了改变。 This callback indicates that the focus area of the camera has changed. The SDK triggers this callback when the local user uses the method to change the user role after joining the channel. This callback is triggered by the local user calling the method to change the focus position.

p.note: This method applies to mobile platforms only. This callback is only applicable to mobile terminals.

plentry.pd: @param x x coordinate of the changed camera focus area. @param x x coordinate of the changed camera focus area.
@param y y coordinate of the changed camera focus area. @param y y coordinate of the changed camera focus area.
@param width Width of the changed camera focus area. @param width Width of the changed camera focus area.
发生改变的对焦区域的高度。 The height of the changed focus area.
